Thx up !
System requirements can be found here : http://checkrequirements.com/game/star-trek-pc

This comes with an installer and an optional custom cracked-intro. The game itself runs fine; no errors after an hour of playing.

The MAJOR downside to this torrent is that you cannot use the Co-Op feature with LAN. Hopefully someone can do a fix/crack that allows for pirates to do Co-Op, but for now this is the best torrent you could get for this game.

It gives me the error below when trying to install it on 3 different PC's. PC #1 is Core 2 Duo with XP Professional 32 bit OS 3 GB of ram and 512MB Nvidia 8500GT, PC #2 iVista 32 bit OS with Core 2 Quad cpu 4 GB of ram and 1GB Nvidia 8800GT, PC #3 is Core I7 2700k cpu with Windows 7 64 bit OS with 8 GB of ram and 2 GB Nvidia 680GT. I also tried running it in compatability mode and it does NOT work. It still Refuses to install.

The version of this file is not compatible with the version of Windows you're running. Check your computer's system information to see whether you need an x86 (32-bit) or x64 (64-bit) version of the program, and then contact the software publisher.

If anyone has any suggestions please comment below me thanks.......

@SCSA420...that error comes from the OS trying to run something as an .exe   You are obviously trying to start this in a wrong way.  This is an ISO, in which you need to install Daemon Tools lite, or any other IDE emulators, and mount the ISO to your new virtual disc.  If you have already done all this, then explore the disc and try the different setups from within.  Try the actual ST.exe to start.  If all else fails, you may want to explore the ISO and copy everything to a folder and run from there.  I dunno what else if that doesn't work.
